Scripts.OnUpdate:
local tag = getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):GetText()
if tag ~= nil and tag ~= "" then LI_Data.Options.hashtag = tag end

Scripts.OnLoad: for n = 1, 34 do getglobal("LootIt_ItemFilter_Filterlist_Item"..n):ClearAllAnchors() getglobal("LootIt_ItemFilter_Filterlist_Item"..n):SetAnchor("TOPLEFT", "TOPLEFT", LootIt_ItemFilter_Filterlist, 0, n * 20 - 10) getglobal("LootIt_ItemFilter_Filterlist_Item"..n):SetAnchor("BOTTOMRIGHT", "TOPRIGHT", LootIt_ItemFilter_Filterlist, 0, n * 20 + 10) end

Scripts.OnClick:
local _, _, _, d, e = this:GetParent():GetAnchor()
LI_Data.Options.RollFrameX = d LI_Data.Options.RollFrameY = e LI_Data.Options.RollFrameD = getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."_Slider"):GetValue()
LootIt_FrameMover:Hide() LootIt_Optionen:Show()

Scripts.OnShow: this:SetText(TEXT("OBJ_RESET")) this:GetParent():ClearAllAnchors() this:GetParent():SetAnchor("TOPLEFT", "TOPLEFT", UIParent, LI_Data.Options.RollFrameX, LI_Data.Options.RollFrameY)

for i = 0, LI.QualityCount do getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"..i):Show() getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"..i):SetText(LI.GetQualityString(i))
for j = 1, 6 do getglobal(this:GetName().."_Button"..i..j):Show() end end
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Headline"):SetText(LI.Trans("RESULTWINDOW_HEADLINE"))
LootIt_RollResult:SetSize(245, (3 + LI.QualityCount) * 25)

Scripts.OnLoad:
for n = 2, 30 do getglobal("LootIt_History_Item"..n):ClearAllAnchors() getglobal("LootIt_History_Item"..n):SetAnchor("BOTTOMLEFT", "TOPLEFT", getglobal("LootIt_History_Item"..(n - 1)), 0, 0) end
LootIt_History_Item1:ClearAllAnchors() LootIt_History_Item1:SetAnchor("BOTTOMRIGHT", "BOTTOMRIGHT", LootIt_History_Move, -6, -6)

Scripts.OnShow:
this:Hide()
local _, _, frame = GameTooltip:GetAnchor()
if (frame and not string.find(string.lower(frame:GetName()), "bag")) or (LI_Data and LI_Data.Options and LI_Data.Options.noscantip) then GameTooltip1:Hide() GameTooltip2:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEnter:
local name = LI.AddCursorItem(false)
if name then getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(name) else LI.GameTooltip(this, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT", 4, 0, "EXAMPLE_LINK_HELP") end
Scripts.OnReceiveDrag:
local name = LI.AddCursorItem(false)
if name then getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(name) end
local link, filter = getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."_Itemname_Text"):GetText(), getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."_Filtername_Text"):GetText()
LootIt_FilterHelp_Result:SetText(LI.CheckTutorial(link, filter).."\n"..string.gsub(LI.LastResult, " ", " ")) LootIt_FilterHelp_Tipp1:SetText(LI.TutorialTipp(filter, true)) LootIt_FilterHelp_Tipp2:SetText(LI.TutorialTipp(filter, false))
Scripts.OnClick:
local name = LI.AddCursorItem(false)
if name then getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(name) end
Scripts.OnUpdate:
if not this.link or this.link ~= getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):GetText() then this.link = getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):GetText()
for i = 1, 20 do getglobal("LootIt_GameTooltip2TextLeft"..i):SetText("") getglobal("LootIt_GameTooltip2TextRight"..i):SetText("") end
LootIt_GameTooltip2:SetHyperLink(this.link)
if yaCIt then yaCIt.ShowTooltipBySelf(LootIt_GameTooltip2) end end

Scripts.OnKeyUp:
local link, filter = getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."_Itemname_Text"):GetText(), getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."_Filtername_Text"):GetText()
LootIt_FilterHelp_Result:SetText(LI.CheckTutorial(link, filter).."\n"..string.gsub(LI.LastResult, " ", " ")) LootIt_FilterHelp_Tipp1:SetText(LI.TutorialTipp(filter, true)) LootIt_FilterHelp_Tipp2:SetText(LI.TutorialTipp(filter, false))

Scripts.OnShow:
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Headline"):SetText("LootIt! "..tostring(LI.version)) getglobal(this:GetName().."_Itemname_Title"):SetText(LI.Trans("HELP_ITEMLINK")) getglobal(this:GetName().."_Filtername_Title"):SetText(LI.Trans("HELP_FILTER"))
if LootIt_FilterHelp_Itemname.link then LootIt_GameTooltip2:SetHyperLink(LootIt_FilterHelp_Itemname.link)
if yaCIt then yaCIt.ShowTooltipBySelf(LootIt_GameTooltip2) end end
LootIt_FilterHelp_Tipp1:SetText(LI.TutorialTipp("", true)) LootIt_FilterHelp_Tipp2:SetText(LI.TutorialTipp("", false))
